from math import gcd
n = int(input())
MOD = 10 ** 9 + 7
A = [0, 0]
phi = list(range(n + 1))
for i in range(2, n + 1):
    if phi[i] == i:
        for j in range(i, n + 1, i):
            phi[j] = phi[j] * (i - 1) // i
P = [0, 0]
Q = [0, 0]
for i in range(2, n + 1):
    P.append((P[-1] + phi[i]) % MOD)
    Q.append((Q[-1] + phi[i] * i) % MOD)
tot = 0
for g in range(1, n):
    c = n // g
    tot += n * g * P[c] // gcd(n, g) % MOD
    tot -= g * g * Q[c] // gcd(n, g) % MOD
print(tot % MOD)
